Prev

Python Web Development

Next
Framework Website Description
Django www.djangoproject.com Full-featured framework built around its own Object Relational Mapping (ORM) system. To build REST APIs you can add the Django Rest Framework (DRF) library.
Flask flask.palletsprojects.com Micro-framework for web development. Bring your own template language, ORM, auth system etc.
FastAPI fastapi.tiangolo.com Handy if you just need to serve up some JSON (i.e. you're using a front-end framework that handles rendering all the HTML)
Tornado www.tornadoweb.org Python web framework and asynchronous networking library. Jupiterlab/Jupyter Notebook are built using Tornado
Other Frameworks
Bottle, CherryPy, Pyramid, Web2Py
